text.div:
Narrativa gerada: ConceptMap ConceptMapVendorToLOINC

Mapeamento de (não especificado) para http://loinc.org


Grupo 1 Mapeamento de https://developer.apple.com/documentation/healthkit to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRateVariabilitySDNN (Heart Rate Variability SDNN)is equivalent to80404-7 (R-R interval.standard deviation (Heart rate variability))CRITICAL VENDOR ERROR: Apple mislabels this metric. Despite the identifier name containing 'SDNN', Apple Watch actually measures and returns RMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences), NOT SDNN. This is a well-documented naming error in Apple's HealthKit API. Implementers must map to LOINC 80404-7 but understand the actual metric is RMSSD. See: Hernando et al. 2018, Sensors 18(8):2619.
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeartRate (Heart Rate)is equivalent to8867-4 (Heart rate)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRestingHeartRate (Resting Heart Rate)is equivalent to40443-4 (Heart rate --resting)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierStepCount (Step Count)is equivalent to55423-8 (Number of steps in 24 hour Measured)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierDistanceWalkingRunning (Walking + Running Distance)maps to wider concept41950-7 (Number of steps)Distance is wider concept than step count; approximate mapping
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierOxygenSaturation (Oxygen Saturation)is equivalent to2708-6 (Oxygen saturation in Arterial blood)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierRespiratoryRate (Respiratory Rate)is equivalent to9279-1 (Respiratory rate)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyMass (Body Mass)is equivalent to29463-7 (Body weight)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierHeight (Height)is equivalent to8302-2 (Body height)
HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyMassIndex (Body Mass Index)is equivalent to39156-5 (Body mass index (BMI) [Ratio])

Grupo 2 Mapeamento de https://dev.fitbit.com/build/reference/web-api to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
activities-heart-hrv-dailyRmssd (Daily RMSSD)(not mapped)Fitbit correctly labels RMSSD (unlike Apple). However, NO LOINC code exists for RMSSD as of November 2024. Maps conceptually to parasympathetic activity. Fitbit API: GET /1/user/-/hrv/date/{date}.json
activities-steps (Daily Steps)is equivalent to55423-8 (Number of steps in 24 hour Measured)
activities-heart-restingHeartRate (Resting Heart Rate)is equivalent to40443-4 (Heart rate --resting)
sleep-efficiencyis equivalent to93832-4 (Sleep efficiency)

Grupo 3 Mapeamento de https://developer.garmin.com/health-api to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destino
dailyStepsis equivalent to55423-8 (Number of steps in 24 hour Measured)
restingHeartRateis equivalent to40443-4 (Heart rate --resting)
maxHeartRate (Maximum Heart Rate)is equivalent to8889-8 (Heart rate 24 hour maximum)
avgSpo2 (Average SpO2)is equivalent to2708-6 (Oxygen saturation in Arterial blood)

Grupo 4 Mapeamento de https://www.polaraccesslink.com/v3 to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
heart-rateis equivalent to8867-4 (Heart rate)Polar H10 chest strap provides ECG-quality heart rate. Gold standard for wearable HRV measurement.
rr-intervalsis equivalent to8636-3 (R-R interval in EKG)

Grupo 5 Mapeamento de https://cloud.ouraring.com/v2/usercollection to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
hrv_balance (HRV Balance Score)(not mapped)Oura's proprietary HRV score (0-100). NOT raw RMSSD or SDNN. Derived from nocturnal RMSSD but normalized to individual baseline. No direct LOINC equivalent - this is a processed/scored metric, not a physiological measurement.
hr_lowest (Lowest Heart Rate (overnight))is equivalent to8891-4 (Heart rate 24 hour minimum)
hr_average (Average Heart Rate (overnight))narrower8890-6 (Heart rate 24 hour mean)Oura measures overnight only, not full 24 hours
breathing_rate (Breathing Rate (overnight))is equivalent to9279-1 (Respiratory rate)

name: ConceptMapVendorToLOINC
title: Vendor Proprietary Codes to LOINC Mapping
description: Operational ConceptMap for translating proprietary wearable device codes to LOINC standard terminology. Based on gray literature analysis of 75 sources documenting 11 major vendors with 0% LOINC adoption rate.
purpose: Enables semantic interoperability between vendor-specific wearable device data and EHR systems using LOINC. Critical for multi-vendor data aggregation in Learning Health Systems and lifestyle medicine research.

target.comment: CRITICAL VENDOR ERROR: Apple mislabels this metric. Despite the identifier name containing 'SDNN', Apple Watch actually measures and returns RMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences), NOT SDNN. This is a well-documented naming error in Apple's HealthKit API. Implementers must map to LOINC 80404-7 but understand the actual metric is RMSSD. See: Hernando et al. 2018, Sensors 18(8):2619.

target.display: Number of steps in 24 hour Measured

target.comment: Distance is wider concept than step count; approximate mapping

Fitbit correctly labels RMSSD (unlike Apple). However, NO LOINC code exists for RMSSD as of November 2024. Maps conceptually to parasympathetic activity. Fitbit API: GET /1/user/-/hrv/date/{date}.json

Oura's proprietary HRV score (0-100). NOT raw RMSSD or SDNN. Derived from nocturnal RMSSD but normalized to individual baseline. No direct LOINC equivalent - this is a processed/scored metric, not a physiological measurement.
Oura measures overnight only, not full 24 hours
